title: The Moral Question of Voting Abstention
description:
With the 2020 election inching ever closer, I have some questions regarding voting...or rather not voting

Full clip of Russell Brand's interview here: https://youtu.be/3YR4CseY9pk

Follow me on Twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
email me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
